results.title: The Woman in Black
results.brief_description: Young lawyer Arthur Kipps travels to a remote village to organise a recently deceased client’s estate, where he uncovers tragic secrets and glimpses a mysterious woman in black.

constellations_other.name: Optical toys, Totoro and terrors
constellations_other.description: Victorian-era optical toys have inspired the biggest animation studios and the scariest horror films.

results.description: The story follows a young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, who is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. As he works alone in the client’s isolated house, Kipps begins to uncover tragic secrets, his unease growing when he glimpses a mysterious woman dressed only in black.
description_for_label: The story follows a young lawyer, Arthur Kipps, who is ordered to travel to a remote village and sort out a recently deceased client’s papers. As he works alone in the client’s isolated house, Kipps begins to uncover tragic secrets, his unease growing when he glimpses a mysterious woman dressed only in black.

results.title: The Wolves of Willoughby Chase
results.brief_description: England in 1832 is a dark and dangerous place. Ravenous wolves prowl the grounds of Willoughby Chase, but the lovely daughter of the owners, Bonnie, and her cousin, Sylvia, are kept safe by trusted and faithful servants. When Bonnie’s parents set off to travel, Bonnie is left in charge of a new governess, Miss Slighcarp. Bonnie and Sylvia are transported to an orphanage and the greedy, evil Miss Slighcarp takes over the manor. She sacks the loyal servants and begins a reign of terror, helped in part by her strange power over the wolves - but Bonnie and Sylvia resolve to fight her evil powers. Stars Mel Smith.
results.description: England in 1832 is a dark and dangerous place. When Bonnie’s parents set off to travel, Bonnie is left in charge of a new governess, Miss Slighcarp. Bonnie and Sylvia are transported to an orphanage and the greedy, evil Miss Slighcarp takes over the manor. She sacks the loyal servants and begins a reign of terror, helped in part by her strange power over the wolves - but Bonnie and Sylvia resolve to fight her evil powers. Stars Mel Smith.

results.title: The Wolf Man
results.brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

results.description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night. Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.
description_for_label: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night. Lon Chaney Jr.’s turn as the werewolf has been hugely influential on Hollywood representations of the legendary monster, though it is actually the second Universal Pictures werewolf film. Six years earlier the less successful Werewolf of London was released in 1935.

results.title: The Wolf
results.creator_credit: Beverly Bailey, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: It was Beverly Bailey’s husband who suggested she take the trip to England and Canada to meet his family. As Bailey disappeared through the airport door her husband wondered if he’d said the wrong thing.
